   window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || []; // initialize empty dataLayer
  dataLayer.push = function (){
    /*convert arguments to array*/
    var argsArr = Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments);
    /*decorate arguments*/
    var decoratedArgs = argsArr.map(function addThemeToEveryGAEvent(arg) {
      //add a theme to every event if present
      
        arg.theme = "breakfast";
      
      return arg;
    })
    return Array.prototype.push.apply(this, decoratedArgs);
  }
  dataLayer.push({
    'timestamp' : (new Date()).valueOf(),
    'language' : 'de'
  });

// The VersaTag code should be placed at the top of the <BODY> section of the HTML page.
// To ensure that the full page loads as a prerequisite for the VersaTag
// being activated (and the working mode is set to synchronous mode), place the tag at the bottom of the page. Note, however, that this may

      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <footer class="c-footer" role="contentinfo" style="background-image:url( https://d1irtln75o427e.cloudfront.net/release_1.9.3/img/background_footer.jpg )">
     <div class="o-container" data-container="T10 D8">

  <script>
   if(!(window.ActiveXObject) && "ActiveXObject" in window){
      var googleMapScript = document.createElement('script');
      googleMapScript.setAttribute('src', 'https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/js?key=AIzaSyBjZm1lpgMqL8E3nygeNzXnqCyuDCVG_Ug&libraries=places&callback=vueGoogleMapsInit');
      googleMapScript.setAttribute('defer', '');
      googleMapScript.setAttribute('async', '');
      document.body.appendChild(googleMapScript);
    }
  </script>
